channel.title: Bar chart with negative and positive values on one axis
channel.description: I made two queries to build a bar chart with positive and negative values on one axis. First query contains three columns: quarter, plan/fact and income/costs (with + and - values), bar chart that was build on this query looks good (what i exactly want), but it doesn't show positive values on + axis. ![1|690x306](upload://4B4ZzoTPsGNdMcYRQfrkL6epnN6.jpeg) Second query contains four columns: quarter, plan/fact, income and costs (only costs column has - values), and bar chart doesn't show positive axis and values if i group values with plan/fact column in Visualization Editor/ ![2|690x307](upload://rxaNYZO0MKYjkgaLbx4OcdBdT66.jpeg) Does anybody know how to solve this problem?

item.title: Bar chart with negative and positive values on one axis
item.dc:creator: demoniksamael
item.description:
I made two queries to build a bar chart with positive and negative values on one axis.
First query contains three columns: quarter, plan/fact and income/costs (with + and - values), bar chart that was build on this query looks good (what i exactly want), but it doesn’t show positive values on + axis.


Second query contains four columns: quarter, plan/fact, income and costs (only costs column has - values), and bar chart doesn’t show positive axis and values if i group values with plan/fact column in Visualization Editor/

Does anybody know how to solve this problem?

Read full topic
item.source: Bar chart with negative and positive values on one axis
